titulo: Summer Game Fest 2025 live: All the announcements in real time
descricao: NewsWe're live and locked in for a day packed full of announcements and WORLD PREMIERES.

titulo: There's a new Scott Pilgrim brawler coming from the makers of… the old Scott Pilgrim brawler (and TMNT: Shredder's Revenge)
descricao: NewsThe gang's all here (including Anamanaguchi) for Scott Pilgrim EX.

titulo: Atomic Heart 2 is coming and it looks like an open-world genre mashup of a bunch of other sci-fi dystopias
descricao: NewsThe retrofuturistic shooter is back with more color and more Freddie Mercury.

titulo: After 3 years of waiting, Dying Light: The Beast will finally arrive in August
descricao: newsThe DLC-turned-standalone game dropped a new trailer at tonight's Summer Game fest showcase.

titulo: It's a real game—Lies of P: Overture, the Sekiro-like's first major DLC, shadowdrops during Summer Game Fest and is available now
descricao: NewsI've got no release dates to hold me down.

titulo: The Shovel Knight dev's new gothic action game has a demo that has awakened the GBA kid in me
descricao: newsI'm digging this little mouse game.

titulo: Fight across the surface of a giant Rubik's Cube built from chunks of other planets in yet another unhinged shooter from the brains behind Atomic Heart
descricao: NewsThe Cube is a multiplayer MMO from Mundfish that was just announced at Summer Games Fest.

titulo: Capcom continues its victory lap with killer new Onimusha: Way of the Sword trailer at Summer Game Fest
descricao: NEWSIt's never too late to become an Onimusha guy, right?

titulo: Chronicles: Medieval is a stunning sandbox RPG coming in 2026—despite a past commitment to using generative AI, the studio now says the game is '100% handcrafted'
descricao: newsA new Danish studio, Raw Power Games, is behind the medieval sandbox RPG shown early in this year's Summer Game Fest stream.
